name: RunuЯ
description:
Controls

WASD = move
Arrows = attack
Space = drop item

(unfinished.. screenshot if you reach the win room in the north though!)

A single-player competitive roguelike where you go from room to room ala Binding of Isaac, find monsters and powerups on the way until you find a mirror. Once you go through the mirror, you enter a dark dimension where all the doors are open and you have to do the same course but in reverse (if you go through the wrong door, you die), re-fight the same enemies (but stronger).

Developers: 

Mouradif ,Jaspreetkohli72 ,Oblong ,Panda "S" ,ZackySack
